One group receive stretch global postural reeducation ( RPG ) , another group receive mobilization sciatic nerve , third group receive placebo treatment . The evaluation treatment do previously , immediately 20 min later . The test use evaluate elongation Sit Reach active knee extension ( AKE test ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized clinical trial evaluate elongation hamstring make different type stretch mobilization use physiotherapy . This study realize university student long time study sit position , subject randomly assign one three different group . One group receive 10 minute global postural reeducation stretch ( RPG ) , another group receive 10 minute bilateral mobilization sciatic nerve , third group receive placebo treatment . The evaluation treatment do previously , immediately 20 min later . The test use evaluate elongation Sit Reach active knee extension ( AKE test ) . The order measurement test also randomize subject . The intervention always apply physical therapist , measurement always perform another physiotherapist blind .
